text: Martin St-Louis confirme que Jake Allen affrontera le Lightning ce soir. Martin St-Louis confirms that Jake Allen will start against the Lightning tonight. #GoHabsGo
Confirmed Chris Wideman and Laurent Dauphin come out for Jordan Harris and Ryan Poehling for the Canadiens tonight. Jake Allen starts in goal.
Jake Allen finished tonight with 37 saves. It was his sixth straight start facing at least 40 shots.
